content: To the Chief Musician; set to [the tune of] “Do Not Destroy.” A Mikhtam of David. [A record of memorable thoughts of David] when he fled from Saul in the cave.
For my soul finds shelter  safety in You,
And in the shadow of Your wings I will take refuge  be confidently secure
I will cry to God Most High,
Who accomplishes  on my behalf [for He completes my purpose in His plan].
He will send from heaven and save me;
He calls to account him who tramples me down.
God will send out His lovingkindness and His truth.
